topics.title: Message Element
topics.string:
{type=message
    output={@
You look around. The north room is small and dimly lit.

In the south wall is the door leading back to the tavern's main room.
    }
}

---

Message type elements define the text that will be returned to the player.
These element utilize the output field of the message element.

NOTE:
To define messages that display line breaks wherever you insert a line break
in your definition files use the syntax:

{@
...
}


NOTE:
Use this syntax for logic element outputs.
